se.fredin.gravitation.entity.handler

Class LaunchPadHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • se.fredin.gravitation.entity.handler.LaunchPadHandler
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.badlogic.gdx.utils.Disposable

    public class LaunchPadHandler
extends java.lang.Object
implements com.badlogic.gdx.utils.Disposable
    Handler class that is responsible for drawing and updating all the LaunchPad objects in the game.
    Author:
    Johan Fredin

        Creates the launchpads and gives them to the map.
        Parameters:
        map - The TiledMap object the launchpads should be given to.
        UNIT_SCALE - The units cale that this map uses.
        world - The box2D World.

        player1 - Player one.
        player2 - Player two.

      • getRandomAvailableSpawnPoint

        public com.badlogic.gdx.math.Vector2 getRandomAvailableSpawnPoint()
        Checks all the launchpads to see if a player has landed on one. Then returns a random launchpad position from the launchpads where a player is not currently positioned.
        Returns:
        A randomly selected spawnpoint.
